attr.title: REPOSE
attr.desc: A descent into pixel-art purgatory, where recovering oxygen tanks might be the least of your worries. Cynthia says she caresâ€”but are you sure anyone here is telling the truth?
attr.inst: Grab the game at itch.io (https://akuparagames.itch.io/repose). Download it (a .zip file), extract, and copy the contents to this port's `gamedata/assets` folder. Tested with RE_DRMFree_1.0.0.1.zip
attr.inst_md: Grab the game at [itch.io](https://akuparagames.itch.io/repose). Download it (a .zip file), extract, and copy archive contents to this port's `gamedata/assets` folder. Tested with **RE_DRMFree_1.0.0.1.zip**
